name: The Visitor (itch) (ainsley, hareefaree)
description:
The Visitor serves as the introduction for a longer game.  You are the Captain, an augmented intelligence that exists to run the functionalities of an ancient ship. You have been deactivated for centuries, languishing in the orbit of a junk planet. That is, until someone boards the ship and reactivates the computer. SOUND CREDITS
